cause.description:
There is a little baby boy fighing for his life in PICU, his babysitter is to blame. Never Shake A BABY
1. IF you are mad, walk away, NEVER SHAKE A BABY!
2. There should not be a bail high enough to get a person who has harmed a child, out of jail
cause.mission: Raise awareness about Shaken Baby Syndrome
cause.name: Help Baby Kaleb, never shake a baby
